scripts.install: dotnet restore && dotnet build && pnpm install
scripts.clean: dotnet clean && pnpm clean && rm -rf ./**/{bin,obj,node_modules} && pnpm store prune
scripts.k:compose: cd src/AppHost; dotnet aspirate generate --skip-build --output-format compose
scripts.opt:migrate: dotnet ef migrations add --project src/Common/Domain/Trace.Common.Domain.csproj --startup-project src/Common/Domain/Trace.Common.Domain.csproj --context Trace.Common.Domain.Context.OperationContext --configuration Debug Initial --output-dir Migrations
